channel.title: sona on lipu kule
channel.description: Recent content in sona on lipu kule

item.title: ijo lon pi lon ala
item.description: tenpo mute la, jan li kepeken nasin tawa sona pi ijo lon. nasin ni la, jan li ken sona e ijo lon, li ken pali e ijo kepeken sona, li ken kama e sona sin. tenpo mute la, ni li lon: ijo li lon, anu ijo li powe. ona tu li ken ala lon tenpo sama. ni li nasin sona pi tenpo mute. taso tenpo sin la, jan sona nasin li open e toki ni: ken la, ni li lon ala.
